Package MiniGameAPI.MiniGame

Class MiniGame<P extends CustomPlayer<?>>

java.lang.Object
MiniGameAPI.MiniGame.MiniGame<P>
Type Parameters:
P - Type of CustomPlayer that'll be used for users.
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public abstract class MiniGame<P extends CustomPlayer<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
Class that represents a MiniGame
Author:
Elytes
